Student Employment









Contact Information
Phone, Fax, & E-mail:
Main Phone Line: (909) 537-5225
Fax Line: (909) 537-7019
E-mail: student.employment@csusb.edu 
 
 
Business Hours:
Regular: M-F 8:00am - 5:00pm
Summer Session: M-T 7:00am - 5:30pm
 
 
Department Check-In Location:
Sierra Hall, Room 100
(Human Resources Main Lobby)
